analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā chabbīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate chabbīsa. (Vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā chabbīsa ārammaṇe ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate chabbīsa vitthāretabba
